relatedBlades.title: Discover shadow IT with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.subtitle: Enhance visibility and control with a unified platform
relatedBlades.copy:
SaaS applications provide the flexibility and agility you need for supporting your hybrid workforce. But the use of unauthorized SaaS apps and AI tools can introduce new security risks. 

Cloudflare's secure access service edge (SASE) platform enables high-performance and secure access to manage SaaS applications from anywhere in the world. You can increase visibility into app usage, tightly control access, and protect data — while still ensuring employees have the tools they need to be productive.

columnContent.title: Improve visibility
columnContent.description: Discover all the SaaS apps your employees use. Manage shadow IT and use of generative AI tools while bolstering data protection and maintaining compliance.

columnContent.title: Tighten access control
columnContent.description: Regain control over access to SaaS apps. Ensure employees use only authorized apps and sanctioned AI tools.

columnContent.title: Avoid data leaks
columnContent.description: Reduce the risk of data exfiltration through SaaS apps and AI, and prevent employees from sharing sensitive and regulated data.

columnContent.title: Simplify security operations
columnContent.description: Decrease manual effort with a modernized access strategy. Apply consistent access policies across all Internet resources while maintaining comprehensive visibility.

relatedBlades.title: Manage shadow IT with Cloudflare's Zero Trust security
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare enables you to discover all app usage and control access with a unified SASE platform.

button.elementName: Secure SaaS access: HOW IT WORKS - CTA

columnContent.title: Gain comprehensive visibility
columnContent.description: Gain comprehensive visibility and enable secure SaaS access with support for inline and API-based cloud access security broker (CASB) capabilities.

columnContent.title: Implement Zero Trust security
columnContent.description: Apply identity-aware, context-driven Zero Trust policies to control how and where users access your SaaS apps.

columnContent.title: Prevent data loss
columnContent.description: Implement consistent, granular data loss prevention (DLP) controls across SaaS apps to block accidental or risky data sharing.

columnContent.title: Boost access performance
columnContent.description: Boost access performance by capitalizing on Cloudflare's extensive global network. Users enjoy fast performance from anywhere in the world.

relatedBlades.mainHeadline: Mynet delivers secure access to SaaS apps with Cloudflare

content.value: Operating games on behalf of game makers,

has amassed a top-tier portfolio of more than 80 titles. As the company has shifted toward hybrid work, Mynet needed to provide secure access to SaaS apps and other resources without having to rely on a VPN.

The company adopted Cloudflare Access to provide secure access to cloud console and SaaS apps, as well as back-office tools, all with single sign-on (SSO). As a result, Mynet has streamlined remote access, improved performance for users, and strengthened security.
"Cloudflare has streamlined how we implement access controls across the organization. The time and money we save goes to further improving our services."

buttonModal.title: Request a Zero Trust discussion
buttonModal.regularCopy: Fill out the form below, and an expert from our team will get in touch to schedule a customized discussion of your Zero Trust journey and how Cloudflare may be able to help.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare's connectivity cloud simplifies managing shadow IT
relatedBlades.description: Using Cloudflare's unified platform of [cloud-native security](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/cloud/cloud-native-security/) and connectivity, you can see what apps are used and control who can access them.

columnContent.title: Composable architecture
columnContent.description: Address a full range of security and networking requirements by capitalizing on multi-cloud interoperability and customizable networking.

columnContent.title: Performance
columnContent.description: Control SaaS access while delivering better user experiences with a global network that is approximately %{OperationMilliseconds} ms from ~%{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of Internet users.

columnContent.title: Threat intelligence
columnContent.description: Prevent more attacks with intelligence gleaned from proxying ~20% of the web and blocking %{ThreatsBlockedPerDay} billion threats daily.

columnContent.title: Unified interface
columnContent.description: Reduce tool sprawl and alert fatigue by uniting every hybrid work security service in one UI.

features.title: Secure your Internet traffic and SaaS apps
features.description: Learn how to provide users and networks with a secure, high-performance, and flexible path to the Internet through a hands-on implementation guide.
